title: Motokare Retry
overview: Mitsu is a college student who has a trauma caused by her first boyfriend back in junior high school days. Mitsu wants to experience a new love but she suddenly reunites with her ex-boyfriend, Kaede, who has moved to an apartment next to hers. Five years has passed and Kaede has become more sophisticated but his gentle smile remains the same which makes Mitsu feels like she's falling in love with him again.Â
